name: Curtis T. LOVELACE, petitioner, v. ILLINOIS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Curtis T. LOVELACE, petitioner,
v.
ILLINOIS.
attorneys: Motion of The Fines and Fees Justice Center, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The National Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Illinois, Fourth District denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Curtis T. LOVELACE, petitioner,
v.
ILLINOIS.
No. 18-809.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 13, 2019.
Motion of The Fines and Fees Justice Center, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of The National Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Illinois, Fourth District denied.
